trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANKJN604_03000_SEQ_00<tab>Zukin is a Kojin with a new purpose for old chests.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANKJN604_03000_TODO_00<tab>Inspect octopus traps near the <var 1A 02 /var>Adventure<var 1A 01 /var> and obtain an octopus.
TEXT_BANKJN604_03000_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the giant koromo octopus to Zukin.

TEXT_BANKJN604_03000_ZUKIN_000_000<tab>We had some old treasure chests that were lying around, gathering dust. With some creativity on my part, I was able to convert them into octopus traps. And they work exceptionally well, if I may say so myself.
TEXT_BANKJN604_03000_ZUKIN_000_001<tab>Now, I've a mind to gift the good folk of Kokajiya with a fresh catch, and I should be grateful if you could go out and inspect the traps.

TEXT_BANKJN604_03000_ZUKIN_000_002<tab>I've laid three over by the wreck southwest of here. One is bound to have caught an octopus by now. My thanks in advance, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
TEXT_BANKJN604_03000_SYSTEM_000_011<tab>There is a mess of writhing tentacles in the chest!
TEXT_BANKJN604_03000_ZUKIN_000_020<tab>Ah, there you are. Did the kami bless us with a catch?
TEXT_BANKJN604_03000_ZUKIN_000_021<tab>Oho, such a large and lively octopus! Our blacksmith friends shall be pleased!
TEXT_BANKJN604_03000_ZUKIN_000_023<tab>By the way, did I mention that older chests wreathed in weeds make the best traps? Well, they do. You may wish to remember this for your future reference.
